Title: Return to House on Haunted Hill
Writer: Robb White (based on characters created by), William Massa
Actors: Amanda Righetti, Cerina Vincent, Erik Palladino, Tom Riley
Plot: Several years after the events from the first movie, an evil mercenary group and a team of researchers they've taken hostage return to the haunted asylum in search of a precious statue, a satanic idol believed to possess demonic powers.
